titleStmt.title: A proclamation prohibiting the payment and receipt of tonnage and ponndage [sic], and other impositions upon merchandises, under colour of the late pretended ordinance of both Houses of Parliament
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

notesStmt.note: At head of title: By the King.
"Given under our signe manuall at our court of Oxford, the sixteenth day December, in the eighteenth yeare of our reigne."
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
